# MTLShaderValidation.disabled

**Case**

Disables shader validation.

## Declaration

```swift
case disabled
```

## Validation states

- **MTLShaderValidation.default**: The default value when the property isn’t set.
- **MTLShaderValidation.enabled**: Enables shader validation.

items.description: The default value when the property isn’t set.
